attributes.action: Lend his support to keeping the skatepark open and to improve skateboard  facilities in Penkridge, Staffordshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Teenager,s like me, like to use the park. There very few other facilities for teenagers in the village. The location of the skatepark is away from any local housing and compared to the massive upkeep costs of the Haling Dene building any money spent would be a one off with no maintenance costs.
